Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory285.png'}
{1: '1', 3: 'You have traveled for a while without running into any surprises while having also gathered quite a bit of data.'}
{2: "Let's sort out all the key information first.", 3: '8'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Alright, I've laid out all the known information on the Ascendants and Huaxu. I can use this database to screen for useful intel.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It looks like a daunting task. Let's do it!", 4: '3'}
{3: 'You reconvene after investigating for quite some time.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Sorry... I haven't found any clues that match the keywords...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Same here. However, some projections appeared when I was looking for clues regarding the farewell letter.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Seems like the letter has been read in full already, because I saw two people shouting for joy and heading for the location shown with the coordinates.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'When was this recorded?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'The timestamp was too blurry to identify. Seems like it was a long time ago.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Even after all this time, there still hasn't been any news on how to control the Punishing Virus...", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'In other words, they may have run into danger, or it may have been completely useless information.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Any new clues, Lucia?', 3: '24'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I saw a large number of scavengers devoured by the Red Tide.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'A large number of... scavengers?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'They seemed enthralled and willing to be engulfed by the Red Tide.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I only saw this brief moment. I don't have any other information.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "We'll keep an eye out. Let's keep going, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'The Corrupted up ahead are all on the right. The path on the left seems to be safer.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Left or right?'}
